$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter.title: $:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter
$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus-new}}<>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input" focus="yes"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AdvancedSearch/FilterButton]!has[draft.of]]"><$transclude/>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}/>""">
<> <$list filter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>

$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterB.title: $:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/dropdown
$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterB.text: <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-edit-type-dropdown tc-block-dropdown-wrapper"> <$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/advancedsearch" > <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Filter]]"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field="description"/>

$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Shadows.title: $:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Shadows
$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Shadows.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/advancedsearch"> {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/shadow-search-plus-new}}<>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input" focus="yes"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[all[shadows]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]"/>""">
<> <$list filter="[all[shadows]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}sort[title]limit[250]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="match" text="">

$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard.title: $:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard
$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/advancedsearch"> {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/standard-search-plus-new}}<>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input" focus=yes/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$vars userInput={{{ [{$:/temp/advancedsearch}] }}} configTiddler={{{ [[$:/state/search/currentTab]!is[missing]get[text]] ~[{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}] }}} searchListState="$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]butfirst[]limit[1]]" emptyMessage=""" <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]" default={{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}}/>

$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/System.title: $:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/System
$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/System.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/advancedsearch"> {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/system-search-plus-new}}<>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="search" tag="input" focus="yes"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[is[system]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]"/>""">
<> <$list filter="[is[system]search{$:/temp/advancedsearch}sort[title]limit[250]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="match" text="">

$:/core/ui/SideBarLists.title: $:/core/ui/SideBarLists
$:/core/ui/SideBarLists.text: <$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/search"> <$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown-wrapper" state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-search-drop-down tc-popup-handle" state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default=""> {{$:/core/ui/SearchResults}} <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBar]!has[draft.of]]" default={{$:/config/DefaultSidebarTab}} state="$:/state/tab/sidebar" />

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/menu
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.caption: {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text: {{$:/AdvancedSearch}}

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/expand-me-macro
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define getState(tiddler, pre:"")
$:/state/expandMe/$pre$-$tiddler$
\end
\define expandMe(tiddler, pre="", showText:"Show me", hideText:"Hide me", showTooltip:"show", hideTooltip:"hide")
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<getState """$tiddler$""" """$pre$""">> text="show">
  <$button set=<<getState """$tiddler$""" """$pre$""">> setTo="show" tooltip="""$showTooltip$""">$showText$</$button> 
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<getState """$tiddler$""" """$pre$""">> text="show">
  <$button set=<<getState """$tiddler$""" """$pre$""">> setTo="hide" tooltip="""$hideTooltip$""">$hideText$</$button>
  <$transclude tiddler="""$tiddler$""" mode=block>
</$reveal>
\end

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus-new
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text: <<expandMe "$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus" showText:{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}} hideText:{{$:/core/images/fold-button}} showTooltip:"Create a new FILTER search tab">>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define new-advanced-search-plus() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clear/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/cancel-button" /> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/NewTiddler/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/expandMe/-$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-54561037" text="$(search-title)$" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(input-tiddler)$" text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(search-title)$" caption={{$(new-tiddler-input)$!!caption}} input-title="""$(search-title)$""" input-tiddler="""$(input-tiddler)$""" text={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/FilterSearchTemplate}} tags="$:/tags/AdvancedSearch" icon="$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search.svg" /> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/done-button" /> \end \define inner(pre title) <$set name="input-tiddler" value="$pre$inp/$title$" > <$set name="search-title" value="$pre$$title$"> <> \end \define outer() <$macrocall $name="inner" pre="$:/search-flt/" title={{$(new-tiddler-input)$!!caption}} />
<$edit-text field="caption" class="wikilabs-full-width" tiddler="$(new-tiddler-input)$" placeholder="caption" /> - caption
\end <$set name="new-tiddler-input" value=<> > <>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/FilterSearchTemplate
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-title}}/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/delete-button" /> <>
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="search-term" tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$macrocall $name="exportButton" exportFilter=<> lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddlers/"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-edit-type-dropdown"> <$linkcatcher to={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Filter]]"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field="description"/> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} type="search" tag="input"/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="search-term" tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter=<>/>">
<> <$list filter=<> template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
V 0.2.0 - 2021-03-07

* make plugin compatible with TW V5.1.23
* make plugin compatible with field-search plugin V0.3.0

V 0.1.2 - 2020-12-25

* update license

V 0.1.1 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 0.1.0 - beta 2019.01.06

* fix wikify problems with TW 5.1.19

V 0.0.2 - beta

* initial release
** name: advanced-search-plus

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/license
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
[[Advanced Search Plus|https://wikilabs.github.io/#advanced-search-plus]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2021

https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text: * Adds the "Advanced Search" tab also to the right sidebar * Replaces the default search option with an icon * Adds a "+" button to the advanced search function ** Allows to pin existing search settings to a new tab ---- ''Important'': This plugin modifies several core templates <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] $:/AdvancedSearch $:/tags/AdvancedSearch"><$link to=<>><>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/shadow-search-plus
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define new-advanced-search-plus() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clear/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/cancel-button" /> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/NewTiddler/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/expandMe/-$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/shadow-search-plus"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-54561037" text="$(search-title)$" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(input-tiddler)$" text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$(search-title)$" caption={{$(new-tiddler-input)$!!caption}} input-title="""$(search-title)$""" input-tiddler="""$(input-tiddler)$""" text={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/ShadowSearchTemplate}} tags="$:/tags/AdvancedSearch" icon="$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/shadow-search.svg" /> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/done-button" /> \end \define inner(pre title) <$set name="input-tiddler" value="$pre$inp/$title$" > <$set name="search-title" value="$pre$$title$"> <> \end \define outer() <$macrocall $name="inner" pre="$:/search-sdw/" title={{$(new-tiddler-input)$!!caption}} />
<$edit-text field="caption" class="wikilabs-full-width" tiddler="$(new-tiddler-input)$" placeholder="caption" /> - caption
\end <$set name="new-tiddler-input" value=<> > <>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/TabButtonTemplate
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
<$tiddler tiddler=<<currentTab>>>
<$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/>
<$transclude tiddler=<<currentTab>> field="caption">
<$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/>
</$transclude>
</$tiddler>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/ui/Buttons/search-plus
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.caption: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/standard-search.svg}} search-plus
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text: <$button set="$:/state/tab/sidebar--1835078512" setTo="$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/menu" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1027337707" text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard"/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/standard-search.svg}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}}/>
